title: Elton John confesses Elvis was disappointing to meet as he was in a 'complete drug haze'

Music legend Sir Elton John has famously battled with drug and alcohol abuse throughout the year's of his iconic career.

During a resurfaced interview with Oprah Winfrey from 1990's, the music superstar, now 72, reflected on meeting Elvis Presley in 1976.

He told the TV agony aunt at the time: "It was so sad, because he turned into this big man with no eyes. They had sunk into the back of his head and it was pathetic."

Elton recently recalled the disappointing meeting with Elvis again to writer Tom Doyle, for his book about Elton called Captain Fantastic.

(Image: Own)

Doyle published: "Elton looked into the eyes of the King and felt there was ‘nothing there’."

John described to the writer: "It was someone who was in a complete drug haze giving nylon scarves away to these fans and yet it was still, in a way, magical."

During the musician's initial interview with Oprah, Elton predicted that the king of Rock and Roll would be dead within a year and his shock realisation that he had turned into Elvis.

(Image: Own)

(Image: Own)

Elton is currently on his final tour, Farewell Yellow Brick Road World Tour, and recently hit the headlines after he published his first autobiography, Me.

The Rocket Man's autobiography details everything from Elton's misadventures and mishaps to indiscreet tales about his famous friends.

Sir Elton explains how – despite ­consuming mountains of cocaine and lakes of vodka martinis – he’s not only still standing at the age of 72, but has become one of the nation's icons.

(Image: Own)

Elton’s book is hugely critical of his father Stanley Dwight and his mother Sheila , who died aged 92 in 2017.

Me's uniquely revealing nature also exposes Elton's husband's David Furnish's secret battle with booze addition .

(Image: Publicity Picture)

(Image: WireImage)

The movie producer, 56, has been legally married to the music superstar for five years and they have two sons together.

In the book, Elton reveals he discovered David had a problem when he started finding empty bottles of boozed all over the houses they shared.

They entered into a civil partnership in 2005 and later wed in 2014.
description: Sir Elton John has revealed why his meeting with the King of Rock and Roll was a wake-up call
